idea-plugin.name: Lenter
idea-plugin.description:
Lenter - AI-Powered Code Documentation & Bug Reporting

Automate routine developer tasks: generate KDoc comments and create formatted Jira bug reports directly from your IDE.

‚ú® Features

üìù KDoc Comment Generation

  • Smart Documentation: Automatically generates KDoc comments in Russian for Kotlin classes, functions, and properties
  • Batch Processing: Comment entire classes with a single shortcut
  • Consistent Style: Follows your project's documentation standards
  • AI-Powered: Uses local Ollama models - your code never leaves your machine
  • Supports: @property, @param, @return tags with intelligent detection

üêõ Bug Report Generator

  • Natural Language Input: Describe bugs in free text
  • Auto-Formatting: Converts to Jira-compatible tables with proper markup
  • Editable Templates: Review and modify before submission
  • Live Preview: See formatted output in real-time
  • Direct Integration: Create Jira issues with one click
  • Structured Output: Includes environment, steps to reproduce, expected vs actual results

‚å®Ô∏è Shortcuts

  • Ctrl+Alt+K (‚åò+‚å•+K on Mac) - Generate comments for entire class
  • Ctrl+Alt+B - Open bug report generator

üöÄ Quick Start

  1. Install Ollama and download a model: 
    ollama pull qwen2.5-coder:7b
  2. Configure plugin: Settings ‚Üí Tools ‚Üí Lenter Settings
    • Ollama API URL: http://localhost:11434
    • Model: qwen2.5-coder:7b
  3. (Optional) For Jira integration:
    • Set Jira URL and Project settings
    • Create Personal Access Token in Jira
    • Configure token in plugin settings

üîí Privacy First

  • Uses local Ollama instance - no cloud APIs
  • Your code never leaves your machine
  • No telemetry or data collection

üéØ Recommended Models

  • qwen2.5-coder:7b - Best balance of quality and speed
  • qwen2.5-coder:3b - Faster, lighter option
  • llama3.1:8b - Alternative choice

üí° Use Cases

  • Document legacy code quickly
  • Maintain consistent documentation style across team
  • Speed up code reviews with proper documentation
  • Create detailed bug reports without manual formatting
  • Streamline QA workflow with Jira integration

üõ†Ô∏è Requirements

  • IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1+ or any JetBrains IDE
  • Java 21+
  • Ollama installed locally
  • (Optional) Jira instance with Personal Access Tokens support

üìö Learn More

Documentation | Report Issues | Ollama Setup Guide
